Advanced Growth & AI Marketing

The Digital Marketing with AI Advanced Course is designed for professionals, entrepreneurs, and students who want to master the future of marketing. This program blends advanced digital marketing strategies with artificial intelligence tools...

The Digital Marketing with AI Advanced Course is designed for professionals, entrepreneurs, and students who want to master the future of marketing. This program blends advanced digital marketing strategies with artificial intelligence tools to help you build high-performing campaigns, automate customer journeys, and scale businesses with data-driven insights. From SEO, PPC, social media, and content marketing to funnel building, automation, and AI-driven ads, this course covers everything you need to become agency-ready. You'll also gain hands-on experience by working on a capstone project, where you'll design and execute a complete AI-powered marketing campaign.

Welcome to AI for Everyone: Unraveling the Secrets of AI Tools—an exhilarating seminar that invites you on an AI adventure! Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a curious learner, or a seasoned professional, this event is your ticket to unlocking the magic of AI and stepping into a smarter, more efficient world. Are you ready to unlock the magic of AI? Discover AI tools that can transform the way you work, create, and thrive. Participants will have access to recorded video classes for six months and will receive an e-certificate upon completion of the live sessions, providing lasting value from this interactive learning experience. Join us for an AI Adventure!

ML & Data Science Certification Program

The Machine Learning & Data Science Course is designed to introduce learners to the essentials of data-driven technologies. Starting from Python basics, the course takes you through data handling, visualization, and core statistical concepts...

The Machine Learning & Data Science Course is designed to introduce learners to the essentials of data-driven technologies. Starting from Python basics, the course takes you through data handling, visualization, and core statistical concepts before moving into Machine Learning. You'll gain hands-on experience in building ML models, understanding their performance, and applying evaluation metrics to ensure accuracy. By the end of the program, you'll have a strong foundation to explore advanced data science and AI concepts, making you industry-ready.

Python for Beginners

The Python for Beginners course offered by Manorama Horizon in association with Unique World Robotics (UWR) is designed to introduce students to the world of Python programming through hands-on projects and real-world applications. The course combines fundamental programming concepts with practical implementation...

The Python for Beginners course offered by Manorama Horizon in association with Unique World Robotics (UWR) is designed to introduce students to the world of Python programming through hands-on projects and real-world applications. The course combines fundamental programming concepts with practical implementation, making learning both engaging and effective. This course, led by our seasoned instructors at UWR, is meticulously designed to guide you from the basics to advanced concepts of Python programming. Through immersive, hands-on learning and practical coding projects, you'll develop a deep understanding of Python syntax, data structures, algorithms, and interesting libraries. Join us on this journey into the core of programming, where precision and performance meet to create groundbreaking solutions.

ChatGPT for Beginners

This self-paced course is designed to help absolute beginners get started with ChatGPT in a practical and engaging way. You'll learn how to set up and use ChatGPT on different devices, understand how to interact effectively through prompts...

This self-paced course is designed to help absolute beginners get started with ChatGPT in a practical and engaging way. You'll learn how to set up and use ChatGPT on different devices, understand how to interact effectively through prompts, and explore the full range of features including customization options and more. Whether you're using it for personal productivity, learning, or creative tasks, this course gives you the tools to make ChatGPT work for you.

Digital Marketing with AI for Beginners

This beginner-friendly course introduces learners to the fundamentals of digital marketing enhanced with AI tools, guiding them through every essential channel and skill needed for a successful digital marketing career. Across 15 days of live, hands-on training, participants explore social media, website building, SEO, PPC...

This beginner-friendly course introduces learners to the fundamentals of digital marketing enhanced with AI tools, guiding them through every essential channel and skill needed for a successful digital marketing career. Across 15 days of live, hands-on training, participants explore social media, website building, SEO, PPC, and direct marketing, while integrating solutions like Canva, video editing software, and Google Analytics. AI-powered content creation, data-driven decision-making, and campaign optimization are woven throughout, equipping students to run social media pages, create websites, launch ads, and monitor performance using GA4.

STEM Training for Teachers

Education is the foundation of progress, and educators play a crucial role in shaping the leaders of tomorrow. With the rapid advancement of technology, it is essential to integrate STEM-based learning (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) into education. Our Online STEM Trainer Capacity Building Program is designed to empower educators...

Education is the foundation of progress, and educators play a crucial role in shaping the leaders of tomorrow. With the rapid advancement of technology, it is essential to integrate STEM-based learning (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) into education. Our Online STEM Trainer Capacity Building Program is designed to empower educators, professionals, and enthusiasts with cutting-edge knowledge in STEM education. This program provides hands-on experience in coding, artificial intelligence, robotics, IoT, app development, AR/VR, web design, 3D design & printing, and much more. This 3-month online training program consists of weekly four sessions, each lasting 2 hours, ensuring in-depth learning while maintaining flexibility for working professionals and students.

Join the Microsoft Excel with AI Training and Microsoft Office Specialist Excel Expert Certification Program by Manorama Horizon for transformative learning. Gain Microsoft Global Certification, recognized worldwide for Excel and AI proficiency. Learn from Microsoft Certified Trainers in dynamic online sessions, focusing on practical skills. Take the Microsoft Global Examination to validate your expertise and gain a competitive edge in the job market. Earn the prestigious Online Badge to showcase your skills. Whether you're a student, professional, or entrepreneur, this program offers immense value. Enroll now at manoramahorizon.com for a successful future. The Subscribers can access the recorded video classes for a duration of 6 months after the live sessions are concluded.

PSC 360

Manorama Horizon, in association with Thozhilveedhi presents PSC 360, an all-in-one KPSC Foundational Course designed for aspiring candidates targeting all levels of Kerala Public Service Commission (PSC) exams—10th, 12th.

Manorama Horizon, in association with Thozhilveedhi presents PSC 360, an all-in-one KPSC Foundational Course designed for aspiring candidates targeting all levels of Kerala Public Service Commission (PSC) exams—10th, 12th. Whether you are beginning your journey or revising the fundamentals, PSC 360 gives you a rock-solid foundation to clear any general PSC exam confidently.

HARI B NAIR

Founder - Digital Lesson

Hari B. Nair is a seasoned digital marketing leader with over 15 years of experience in driving high-impact marketing strategies for top global brands. He has worked with renowned agencies like Ogilvy, Havas Media, and IPG Media Brands, specializing in digital strategy, media planning & buying, and performance-driven campaigns...

Hari B. Nair is a seasoned digital marketing leader with over 15 years of experience in driving high-impact marketing strategies for top global brands. He has worked with renowned agencies like Ogilvy, Havas Media, and IPG Media Brands, specializing in digital strategy, media planning & buying, and performance-driven campaigns. Hari has successfully led teams, scaled operations, and developed integrated media solutions across industries such as Health Care, EdTech, FoodTech, Auto, Luxury, and BFSI. Known for his strategic vision and hands-on leadership, Hari is passionate about driving business growth and creating innovative solutions that deliver measurable results.

Shilpa Biju

M.Tech Rank Holder & EdTech Expert

An M.Tech rank holder with over 7 years of impactful experience in the EdTech sector, Shilpa, has successfully trained thousands of students for a wide range of competitive government exams, including PSC, SSC, KAS, RRB, Bank, UPSC, NDA, and more...

An M.Tech rank holder with over 7 years of impactful experience in the EdTech sector, Shilpa, has successfully trained thousands of students for a wide range of competitive government exams, including PSC, SSC, KAS, RRB, Bank, UPSC, NDA, and more. With a proven track record of results, Shilpa is dedicated to helping aspirants achieve their dream careers through structured guidance, expert strategies, and student-focused teaching.

Belson V Baisil

Finance Professional & CEO

Belson V B is a seasoned finance professional with 22 years of extensive experience in Stock Broking, Equity Research, Banking, and Financial Services...

Belson V B is a seasoned finance professional with 22 years of extensive experience in Stock Broking, Equity Research, Banking, and Financial Services. He has held key leadership roles at renowned financial institutions, including Geojit, Sharekhan, Fidelity, Dhanlaxmi Bank, and ICICI Bank. As the CEO of STOXBELL WEALTH PVT LTD, Belson spearheads the firm's operations in Financial Services, SME IPO Services, and Stock Market Training. A dedicated Investor, Trader, and Trainer, he actively empowers individuals and businesses with strategic financial insights and market expertise. With deep expertise in Wealth management, Stock market, Fundamental and Technical Analysis, Belson is committed to delivering value-driven solutions and fostering financial growth for clients and trainees.

Harish Nath A

Salesforce.com Trainer

Harish Nath, is a seasoned Salesforce.com trainer with over 23 years of experience in the IT training industry, including 11+ years dedicated to the Salesforce platform. He has expertise across multiple technologies such as Mulesoft, TIBCO, SAP BW/BI, Java, and C++...

Harish Nath, is a seasoned Salesforce.com trainer with over 23 years of experience in the IT training industry, including 11+ years dedicated to the Salesforce platform. He has expertise across multiple technologies such as Mulesoft, TIBCO, SAP BW/BI, Java, and C++. Harish is known for his unique 15-step training model that unifies 10 Salesforce technologies to develop enterprise applications effectively. He has trained over 100,000 learners globally, including professionals from leading MNCs like TCS, Infosys, and Wipro, and students from prestigious institutions such as IITs and JECRC. His areas of specialization within Salesforce include Apex, Visualforce, LWC, API integrations, Sales and Service Cloud, and DevOps. Harish has also played a supporting role in the development of Trailhead.com and is the author of APEX for Developing Enterprise Applications on Force.com. Recognized as one of the best Salesforce trainers in India by Salesforce.com India's Developer Relations team, Harish brings both depth of knowledge and an engaging training style tailored to diverse learner needs.
